meanings.definition: Show or represent by a drawing, painting, or other art form.
meanings.sent1: The artist will depict a beautiful sunset in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The book will depict the main character's journey through vivid illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The children's book will depict a talking animal in a fun and colorful way.
meanings.sent4: Her words depicted a scene so vivid, it felt like I was there.
meanings.sent5: The mural on the wall will depict a historical event in great detail.

meanings.sent1: The teacher will depict the story of the brave knight to the students.
meanings.sent2: She will depict her emotions through her poetry.
meanings.sent3: The detective will depict the crime scene in his report.
meanings.sent4: His words depicted a picture so clear, it was like watching a movie.
meanings.sent5: The author will depict the magical world in her novel with enchanting descriptions.

meanings.definition: Portray or represent in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The movie will depict the hero as a courageous and kind-hearted person.
meanings.sent2: The advertisement will depict the product as a solution to all problems.
meanings.sent3: The comedian will depict the politician in a hilarious skit.
meanings.sent4: Her actions depicted her as a true friend in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The painting will depict nature's beauty in a unique and captivating manner.
